node.html: A blockchain system for educational purposes. The primary purpose of this project was to teach students how algorithms can be used in large systems. Also, students can learn how decentralized systems like blockchain works.
Web-based GIS software was developed to help make management decisions in optimizing access to landmark urban locations in the smart city

An IoT project with a mobile application for managing and tracking the trolleys of airports.
It helps passengers find trolleys as fast as possible. Also, it can help the staff to manage and track each trolley and its status.
Developed an online service for ordering food, written in the microservices architecture.
A data-mining program that finds the frequent sales patterns of the Digikala online store.

frontmatter.title: Home automation platform, for calculating the pattern of energy consumption

node.html: Developed a system based on machine learning models to predict the power consumption pattern of each home in Mashhad.

A desktop application for physicians which helps them to manage patients and the prescriptions.
It is customizable based on the medical expertise .
